requirements: Open to nondepartmental and non-School of Drama students with prior permission of the instructor.
description:
This course examines governance within arts and cultural organizations with a strong emphasis on its practice, as well as how that practice can be managed and adjusted. The first part of each class consists of interactive presentations using real examples from multiple organizations in the field, or case work focused on one particular company. The second part is a laboratory in which students use the concepts learned to prepare and present their findings to the rest of the class.
Open to nondepartmental and non-School of Drama students with prior permission of the instructor.
title: Governance
